name: Selman Dedeakayoğulları
title: Junior AI Engineer | Large Language Models (LLMs) & Computer Vision
profile: Junior AI Engineer with hands-on experience in developing LLM-powered applications, computer vision models, and multimodal AI systems. Skilled in building RAG pipelines, fine-tuning transformer and vision-language models, and deploying AI solutions with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, and HuggingFace. Proven track record as TEKNOFEST AI Hackathon Finalist and OBSS Code Master Winner, delivering AI products for enterprise clients and academic projects. Passionate about optimizing model performance and translating research into real-world solutions.

education.description: Attended Master-level Computer Vision course with MSc students to deepen expertise in visual AI systems.

education.gpa: Transferred after first year with GPA 3.43

experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
experience.description: Developed and maintained enterprise-grade chatbots for Turkish and international clients using Druid AI and integrated LLM-based solutions (LLaMA, GPT-4, GPT-4o, GPT-4 Vision). Delivered multiple proof-of-concepts within tight deadlines, leading to successful pilot-to-production transitions.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Contributed to backend development for various internal modules. Gained experience in large-scale systems. Left early due to Erasmus study abroad program.

experience.title: Computer Vision Intern
experience.description: Designed and trained classification and segmentation models using PyTorch and TensorFlow. Experimented with architectures (ResNet, U-Net, MobileNet, EfficientNet, VGG), achieving up to 95% accuracy on client datasets. Automated preprocessing pipelines, reducing training time by ~20%.

projects.name: Agentic Portfolio Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered portfolio chatbot using Google Gemini API + Streamlit, deployed live on personal website. Integrated job description parser that analyzes postings and calculates skill match percentage. Supports multi-turn conversations, improving recruiter engagement during portfolio reviews.

projects.name: Social Media Analysis for Earthquake Victim Reports
projects.description: Built a multimodal AI pipeline: LLM-based NLP for social media need extraction + YOLOv11s for drone image verification. Achieved 92% accuracy in detecting urgent needs and damage severity. Designed system to operate real-time with multi-language support for disaster management teams.

projects.name: Gendiary: New-Gen Social Media via Stable Diffusion
projects.description: Developed a concept social media app that generates user content using Stable Diffusion. Designed daily unique concept prompts (mood-based, seasonal, trending events). Focused on personalized AI content creation with style templates and user text inputs.

projects.name: Image Captioning Project
projects.description: Fine-tuned multiple VLMs to generate descriptive captions for custom datasets. Optimized pipeline speed by ~40% via preprocessing and inference adjustments.

projects.name: Face Recognition Application
projects.description: Built MTCNN-based face detection + recognition system. Implemented real-time inference with webcam feed; published detailed Medium article on methodology.

awards.name: TEKNOFEST T3 AI Hackathon Finalist
awards.description: Selected among 200+ teams to develop an LLM-based project within 48 hours.

awards.name: EESTech AI Solutions Challenge
awards.description: Created sentimental analysis solution in a hackathon within 4 hours. Achieved 2nd Place.

awards.name: OBSS Code Master Winner
awards.description: Ranked 1st among university participants in an algorithm-based problem-solving competition.

organizations.name: IEEE Computer Society Turkey Chapter
organizations.description: Coordinated IEEE CS student branch leaders across Central Anatolia. Co-organized CSCON’22 with 2000+ participants, including technical trainings, company booths, networking, and internship showcases.

references.name: Abdullatif BABA
references.title: Associate Professor
references.organization: Kuwait College of Science and Technology
